process-definition.name: reportingperiod_mainmember
process-definition.description: This represents the workflow associated to reporting periods. Site CRA -> CALGB Data Coordinator -> Finalize

transition.to: Submit Reporting Period for Data Coordinator Review

node.name: Submit Reporting Period for Data Coordinator Review
node.description: This task is executed by the CRA.

node.name: Data Coordinator Review
node.description: This task is executed by the Central office

transition.to: Provide Additional Information To Data Coordinator
transition.name: Request Additional Information

node.name: Provide Additional Information To Data Coordinator
node.description: This task is executed by the CRA

node.name: Finalize Reporting Period
node.description: This task is executec by the Central office
